title: How to Get a Pet in World of Warcraft

steps.title: Stop worrying.
steps.content: Stop worrying. In this short article you will see how to get a pet in World of Warcraft.

steps.title: To be able to get a pet, you need to be at least level 10 hunter.
steps.content: To be able to get a pet, you need to be at least level 10 hunter. So, if you are not, level yourself until you are. The steps below are for both the Alliance and the Horde sides of the game:

steps.title: Accept the Taming the Beast Quest from your local Hunter Trainer.
steps.content: Accept the Taming the Beast Quest from your local Hunter Trainer.

steps.title: Take the Taming Rod.
steps.content: Take the Taming Rod. The quest needs you to tame 3 pets.

steps.title: You need to tame each one and then return to the quest giver to get the second task.
steps.content: You need to tame each one and then return to the quest giver to get the second task.

steps.title: Find a Barbed Crawler (Alliance) or An Adult Plainstrider (Horde) and use your Taming Rod.
steps.content: Find a Barbed Crawler (Alliance) or An Adult Plainstrider (Horde) and use your Taming Rod.

steps.title: Do not attack the animal.
steps.content: Do not attack the animal. You just need to wait and keep yourself alive until the animal is tamed.

steps.title: Take the pet to the trainer and abandon your pet by right clicking on it.
steps.content: Take the pet to the trainer and abandon your pet by right clicking on it.

steps.title: Use the taming rod on Greater Timberstrider (Alliance) or a Prairie Stalker (Horde) and wait until it is tamed.
steps.content: Use the taming rod on Greater Timberstrider (Alliance) or a Prairie Stalker (Horde) and wait until it is tamed.

steps.title: Take the pet to the trainer and get the third task.
steps.content: Take the pet to the trainer and get the third task.

steps.title: Use the taming rod on a Nightstalker (Alliance) or a Swoop (Horde) and tame the animal.
steps.content: Use the taming rod on a Nightstalker (Alliance) or a Swoop (Horde) and tame the animal.

steps.title: Take the pet back to the trainer and he will ask you to go and talk with Ganaar (Alliance) or Holt Thunderhorn (Horde) so that you will be taught the basics necessary to care and train your pets from now on.
steps.content: Take the pet back to the trainer and he will ask you to go and talk with Ganaar (Alliance) or Holt Thunderhorn (Horde) so that you will be taught the basics necessary to care and train your pets from now on.

steps.title: You can now choose your future pets and train them.
steps.content: You can now choose your future pets and train them.
